metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5195 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Irssi 0.8.17 before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) via a crafted ANSI x8 color code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3').
